INSERT INTO player_tb(playerId, betId, teamId, userId, position, point, vote) VALUES(#{playerId}, #{betId}, #{teamId}, #{userId}, #{position}, #{point}, #{vote} )
mapper.select: SELECT playerId, betId, teamId, userId, position, point, vote FROM player_tb WHERE playerId = #{playerId}
SELECT playerId, betId, teamId, userId, position, point, vote FROM player_tb WHERE teamId = #{teamId} AND betId = #{betId} order by playerId asc
SELECT playerId, betId, teamId, userId, position, point, vote FROM player_tb WHERE betId = #{betId} AND userId = #{userId}
SELECT playerId, betId, teamId, userId, position, point, vote FROM player_tb WHERE userId = #{userId}
select count(vote) from player_tb where betId = #{betId} and vote = #{vote}
